settings.section_description: You’ll never find weird sounding words on our ingredient labels, nor will you find processed grains, flours, or other fillers. For example, instead of flour, our single serve pizza crust is made from two ingredients; all natural chicken breast and parmesan cheese. Our family size Cauliflower pizza crust is made from cauliflower, egg and cheese. All of our foods are Grain Free, Gluten Free and use All Natural ingredients.

settings.faq_description: We have over 16,000 retail locations in almost every major city. Use our store locator to find a specific product by location. In our menu just click on Where to Buy.

We use ingredients like chicken breast or Cauliflower instead of processed flours or starches. You’ll never find preservatives or weird sounding ingredients in our items. That’s how we make delicious REAL food with lots of protein and almost no carbs or sugar. Real Food you feel good about eating. Full list of ingredients can be found at ON OUR PRODUCT PAGE :)

Free Shipping on Orders over $79.99. Flat rate of $40 for orders under $79.99. Apparel is made to order and ships separately from the food with expected delivery times between 7-10 business days. Your order is very important to us, and we assure you our team is working around the clock to make sure every order goes out as soon as possible. Click here for the UPS transit map to determine days in transit (between 1-4 days).

IMPORTANT: We do not ship over the weekends - so if an order is placed during the week, and based on location won't arrive by Friday, we will try our best to ship it out Monday or Tuesday. You will receive tracking to your email associated with your order once it's shipped.

Shipping Capabilities: We ship everywhere in the continental US and do not ship to Hawaii, Alaska, or other US territories. You can still find us in stores in those areas. Please visit our Store Locator to find out which products are in stores near you!

settings.faq_title: What are the Best Ways to Prep Your Foods?
settings.faq_description: We're glad you asked ;) -- We have a full list of pro tips and recipes on our "Pro Tips Page" where we share all of our secrets! check them out at our PRO TIPS PAGE.

settings.faq_title: What if my Local Store Isn't Carrying a Product I want?
settings.faq_description: The BEST thing you can do is drop off our Retail Request Form. Trust us, it works! And we would also be forever grateful. Click to download Retail Request Form.

settings.faq_title: If an item is out of stock, how long til it's back in stock?
settings.faq_description: We do our best to restock as soon as possible. Typically, products are restocked within 2-4 weeks. You can sign up for back-in-stock alerts on the products' page to be notified!

settings.faq_title: Do you have discount codes or coupons?
settings.faq_description: Yes! Sign up to our VIP fam through the pop up to receive a $25 gift card! The pop up should appear within the first 10-20 seconds on our site and will stay on the page in the bottom right-hand corner after you exit out!

-How do I cancel or change my order?

We work very fast to get orders out as soon as possible, so if you need to cancel or change your order, please contactus@realgoodfoods.com or call us at 818-299-4179 within the same day of placing your order. If you contact us outside of the same day of placing the order and your order has already shipped, we cannot provide refunds, cancellations, or order changes.

-How can I get a refund?

If you are unsatisfied with your order, please email contactus@realgoodfoods.com and we will provide you with a shipping label to return the Food along with a brief survey to help us improve!

-Can I store your Food in the fridge?

Yes! All items, except for Ice Cream and Bacon Wrapped Stuffed Chicken can be stored in the fridge for up to 10 days.

-What makes your Food different?

We are 100% gluten and grain free and use only REAL food to provide low-carb, delicious options for any occasion. Everything has less than 12g net carbs per serving, are high in protein, low in sugar, and made with real food ingredients

-What are Net Carbs?

Net carbs are the Total amont of Carbohydrates minus the fiber and low-glycemic sugars/sweeteners!
For example, our Enchiladas have 4g total carbs and 2g fiber,
so 4g Carbs -2g fiber = 2g net carbs!

-Do you have Vegan or Vegetarian Options?

At this time, we do not have any Vegan options, but we do have vegetarian Pizzas that are available at select retail stores, like Publix!

-Do you have any Dairy-free items?

Yes! Our Chicken Burrito Bowl, Mongolian Beef Bowl, and Steak Burrito Bowl are dairy free!

All of our Foods are Certified Gluten Free. 
Ice Cream is Gluten Free, however, it is made in a facility that processes gluten. 
View the nutrition panel for specific items regarding other allergens (nuts, dairy, etc.)

Please visit our Investors page for more details! 
https://investors.realgoodfoods.com/

settings.review_desc: I love Real Good Foods supreme pizza. The sausage breakfast sandwich is also really good. They are delicious and I recommend their products. Clean ingredients and macros on point!

I've tried several different things and they're all delicious! It's so amzing to have a variety of different keto options in my freezer for when I'm not in the mood to cook. Keep up the good work, your comapny is much needed in the keto community 😍 - @thegiveupgirl

Real Good Foods has delicous guilt free options! I have the type one diabetes and celiac disease and real good helps me make a quick meal without feeling terrible after! It's so hard to find foods that are low car, gluten free and actually taste GOOD. Real Good hits the mark, definitely recommend 💯

Their cauliflower pizza tastes amazing! It's suuuuper key friendly, which I love. At only 8 net carbs for the WHOLE pizza, this makes a wonderful meal. I really love their enchiladas too and their chicken poppers. I have to try the stuffed chicken, but it's in my freezer so I'll get to it soon 😄😄

I love real good foods because of their amazing keto friendly meals! The enchiladas and mini pizzas are my favorite, they are sooo good and taste exactly like the carb filled versions. Great for a quick lunch or dinner.

Supreme Pizza, Beef Enchilada, and Cheese Enchilada are the entrees I've tried from The Real Good Food Company. They are all D-E-L-I-C-I-O-U-S!!! Highly recommend this company, and their fantastic food! Yum!

settings.banner_intro:
Who We Are

We make delicious food you’ll feel good about eating; high in protein, grain free and always made from real, nutrient dense ingredients.
settings.banner_intro_after:
Our Mission: #BeRealGood

We believe there is a better way to feed our future. Today, 1 in 3 Americans are suffering from the health effects of obesity or diabetes due to poor nutrition. Our mission is to make nutritious foods— grain free, high in protein, never added sugar and from real ingredients—more accessible to everyone, improve human health, and in turn improve the lives of millions of people.



Our Culture: Always Keep it REAL

We will always be REAL with each other and our community – we will always listen, learn, be transparent and be available 24/7.

settings.feature_desc: We use only simple all-natural real-food ingredients, that you’d invite to your home.
We deliver high protein through REAL food — such as all-natural chicken and cheese. So your body can absorb REAL nutrients not chemically-made protein powders.

Instead of processed carbs, and bleached flours, we use nutrient dense ingredients to make our foods. For example, our Pizza crusts are made from Cauliflower, almonds and eggs, instead of processed flour.
The Food you eat should leave you FEELING GOOD vs. slowing you down (we all know the food hangover feeling).  We’re committed to making nutritious food to fuel your body, and keep you feeling good.
Our food is made with no added sugar and only ingredients that have low-glycemic impacts and will not cause blood sugar spikes.

settings.phil_desc: Always keeping it REAL, with our food, community, and each other.

settings.card_1_head: Bartley Weaver (@dreamweaveriv) Bodybuilder, Professional Eater, Tennessee Titan
settings.card_1_desc: I choose Real Good Foods because I can enjoy all of my favorite savory foods and still hit my macronutrient goals. Most of my savory cravings are loaded with carbs, but with the lineup at RGF I can tackle my cravings even on a low carb diet. I have used RGF throughout my contest preps the past three years. Dieting has never been easier! I love having flexibility to eat non-traditional bodybuilding food and still reach my physique goals.
settings.card_2_desc: I choose to eat Real Good Foods because they taste like many of my favorites, without having a huge impact on my blood sugar. It’s much easier to manage diabetes when you are able to find foods you love that are lower carb, but still taste great!

settings.timeline_desc: After years of testing recipes in his local pizzeria, our founder, Josh Schreider, created our first product, Chicken Crust Personal Pizzas.
We launched into our 1st customer, Vitamin Shoppe, with our own branded freezers!
Real Good Foods launches Enchiladas to offer a healthier option for Mexican food!
Later that year, we created a family size cauliflower crust pizza; unlike other cauliflower crust pizzas, our crust is 100% grain free!
For NDAM, we partnered with Beyond Type 1 and raised over $50k for diabetes awareness month!
We introduced Low-carb, keto-friendly Stuffed Chicken Nuggets!
Breakfast was by far the most requested item from our #realgoodfam, so we created breakfast sandwiches made with cauliflower cheesy bread!
We launched Stuffed Chicken and Bacon Wrapped Stuffed Chicken for a grain-free, low-car entrée options for our fam.
We wanted to give our fam an even more nutritious pizza, so we created one of the first avocado-based Pizza Crusts—our Superfood Pizzas!
Our Entrees were always a favorite, so we wanted to provide a full-meal Entrée that is completely grain and gluten free and made with veggie noodles or rice, and all-natural meats!
After many requests for more Breakfast items, we launched Grain-Free Waffles made with egg whites instead of processed flour!
Our FIRST EVER item launched into Costco! Our Grain-Free Bacon Wrapped Stuffed Chicken in a 6 pack now at Costco nationwide!
We can’t wait for you to see what we’re working on next!

settings.content_desc:
We're a small, family owned business based in Los Angeles, California. We share a passion for our community aka #realgoodfamily. We love hearing from you, so we shared our personal info below - reach out anytime.

Text or Call at 818-299-4179

We've been blown away by the connections we've made on social over the past few years. BY FAR, the most rewarding part of our jobs is getting to know each every one of you. You push us to be better, and do better - and we are forever grateful. If you're just now discovering us, learn more about @realgoodfoods on IG and don't hesitate to say hi. Or, Text us at 818-299-4179 anytime.  We’re available for you 24/7.

settings.faq_question: What is the ticker symbol and on what exchange is Freshpet traded?
settings.faq_answer: Shares of Freshpet common stock are traded on the NASDAQ Global Market under the ticker symbol FRPT. Freshpet stock first began trading on November 7, 2014.

settings.faq_question: How do I obtain a copy of the Company's financial statements and public filings?
settings.faq_answer: Annual and quarterly financial results and other information for Freshpet are available on this website. You can automatically receive updates by clicking on Email Alerts.

settings.faq_question: Who is the Company's transfer agent, and what is its contact information?
settings.faq_answer:
Freshpet's transfer agent is:
Computershare Trust Company, N.A.
P.O. Box 43078
Providence, RI 02940
1-800-942-5909

settings.faq_question: When is the fiscal year end for Freshpet?
settings.faq_answer: Our fiscal year ends on December 31.

settings.faq_question: Does Freshpet pay a cash dividend?
settings.faq_answer: The Company intends to reinvest any earnings in developing and expanding its business and does not anticipate paying any cash or non-cash dividends in the foreseeable future.

settings.faq_question: How can I purchase Freshpet stock?
settings.faq_answer: Interested investors may purchase shares through any registered broker.

settings.faq_question: Who is the Company's independent auditor?
settings.faq_answer: KPMG LLP serves as the Company’s independent auditor.

Freshpet is headquartered at:
400 Plaza Dr., First Floor
Secaucus, NJ 07094

We are one of the fastest growing brands in Frozen Food today, offering breakfast, entree, snacks & pizza options in over 16,000 stores nationwide, including: Costco, Walmart, Publix, and Target.

settings.sec_desc: Today, 1 in 3 Americans are suffering from the health effects of obesity or diabetes due to poor nutrition. The Foods available today in grocery stores, especially in Frozen, aren’t helping…loaded with processed grains, sugars and other unnatural ingredients.
We’ve partnered with food banks across the US to make our nutritious foods more accessible to those in need, and our Team’s goal is to donate 1 million meals.

We’ve been blown away by the relationships we’ve built on social over the past few years. BY FAR, the most rewarding part of our jobs is getting to know each and every one of you. You push us to be better, and do better—and we are forever grateful. If you’re just now discovering us, learn more about @realgoodfoods on IG and don’t hesitate to say hi. Or, text us at 818-299-4179 anytime.
We’re available for you 24/7.

settings.irn_top_heading: Real Good Foods in the News
settings.irn_disclaimer: *Real Good Foods is not responsible for, does not ensure the accuracy of, and does not endorse the information or content found on third-party websites.

settings.section_content: Founded in 2016, Real Good Foods is on a mission to make nutritious foods more accessible and improve human health. Real Good Foods is one of the only brands in frozen today to offer foods that are high in protein, lower in carbs and using real food ingredients—always grain free and gluten free. Available in over 15,000 stores nationwide, and directly from their website at realgoodfoods.com. Learn more about Real Good Foods on Instagram @realgoodfoods, where they have one of the largest social media followings of any brand within the frozen food industry today with over 425,000 followers.

settings.kir_content: On a mission to make your favorite foods more nutritious, and more accessible, so we can feel better and live longer. And in the process, always keep it REAL.

settings.grid_title: High Protein, Lower Carbs and Grain Free
So You Feel Good About Eating

settings.section_content: Are you passionate about taking your career to the next level at one of the fastest growing food companies in the US? Are you motivated, hard-working, and looking for an opportunity that offers lots of learnings, development, and upside? If you answered yes to either of those, you are at the right place

settings.faq_answer:
Real Good Foods (RGF) is on a mission to make nutritious foods more accessible, improve human health, and better the lives of millions of people.

In just 4 years, RGF has become one of the fastest-growing frozen food brands in the US, revolutionizing Frozen Food categories—from Breakfast, Entrees, Snacks, and more—with nutrient-dense, low-carb, high-protein, always delicious foods made from REAL food ingredients.

As health conditions and diabetes are becoming a bigger concern in the US Today (1 in 3 US consumers are Pre-Diabetic or Diabetic), RGF is on a mission to make nutritious foods more accessible— available today in over 16,000 stores nationwide including Walmart, Costco, Sam’s, Publix, Target, Kroger and more.

Real Good Foods has grown by creating a massive presence on social media, with the 2nd largest community on Instagram in the US for Frozen Food companies, creating hundreds of new relationships daily. And we’re just getting started.

At RGF, we ALWAYS keep it REAL—with our ingredients, our community, and each other. Behind every box, we are a small team of dedicated, passionate, motivated, and ambitious team members. We’re passionate about bringing delicious, nutritious food to people everywhere, but we’re never preachy about it. We believe in being casual and having fun with every community interaction and we don’t need to try too hard. And we’re never content—we want to connect with more people, bring new foods to the market, get in more stores, and in general aspire to become better.

settings.job_desc:
What You’ll Do: Oversee all production operations including but not limited to managing budgets, people, training, safety, food safety, improving quality and constantly improving efficiencies.

If interested, please email Rosie Gaspar at RosieG@realgoodfoods.com with your resume, cover letter, location, contact information, and any other information you’d like to share.

What You’ll Do: Sourcing , evaluating and establishing long term relationships with existing and new contract manufacturers.

If interested, please email Rosie Gaspar at RosieG@realgoodfoods.com with your resume, cover letter, location, contact information, and any other information you’d like to share.

What You’ll Do: Complete food label reviews/approvals for FDA and USDA regulated products. Formulate, develop, apply, test and evaluate outgoing products ensuring they are properly prepared and meeting company and customer standards.

If interested, please email Rosie Gaspar at RosieG@realgoodfoods.com with your resume, cover letter, location, contact information, and any other information you’d like to share.

What You’ll Do: Leads and implements all procurement stategies, negotiates with suppliers and vendors to secure favorable cost redcution. Leads the RFP process to deliver value, capturing the business needs.

If interested, please email Rosie Gaspar at RosieG@realgoodfoods.com with your resume, cover letter, location, contact information, and any other information you’d like to share.
